title: Teachable Machine 2: Snake Game
description: Introducing Teachable Machine 2.0 (from Google Creative Lab)!  Train a computer to recognize your own images, sounds, & poses. In this video, I demonstrate how to control an interaction with an image classification machine learning model to play the snake game.

timestamps.title: Modify the code of the snake game
Include the ml5 library in the html
Control the snake with the labels
